sentences.en: ‘I'm on wings,’ she admitted. ‘It's wonderful seeing the palace brightened up.’.
sentences.cn: “我觉得飘飘然，”她承认道。“看到整个王宫都活跃起来真是太棒了”。

sentences.en: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.cn: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.en: A hard-core group of right-wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.cn: 一群骨干右翼参议员曾企图左右自己的同僚。

sentences.en: a presidential candidate waiting in the wings.
sentences.cn: 总统候选人等待着即将当选的希望的消息

sentences.en: Artistic and intellectual people tend towards left-wing views.
sentences.cn: 搞艺术的人和知识分子容易持“左倾”观点。

sentences.en: Despite strenuous objections by the right wing, the grant was agreed.
sentences.cn: 尽管右翼分子极力反对，拨款还是通过了。

sentences.en: He noticed that fabric was tearing away from the plane's wing.
sentences.cn: 他注意到机翼在一块一块地断裂。

sentences.en: Her boss took her under his wing after fully realizing her potential.
sentences.cn: 老板充分意识到她的潜力后，对她关怀备至。

sentences.en: It is a very pretty butterfly, with a 2 inch wing span.
sentences.cn: 这是一只非常美丽的蝴蝶，翼展2英寸。

sentences.en: Left-wing dissidents have been emasculated and marginalised.
sentences.cn: 左派持不同政见者已经遭到削弱和排挤。

sentences.en: Liberals say the paper is too right-wing.
sentences.cn: 自由主义者说这家报纸太保守了。

sentences.en: Mead calls the group "rabidly right-wing".
sentences.cn: 米德把该团体称为“激进右翼团体”。

sentences.en: President Alan Garcia was barracked by the right wing opposition.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·加西亚总统遭右翼反对派喝倒彩。

sentences.en: She hadn't studied for the exam, so she decided to wing it.
sentences.cn: 她没有为考试准备，所以决定临场发挥

sentences.en: The accused is alleged to be a member of a right-wing gang.
sentences.cn: 据称被告是某右翼组织的成员。

sentences.en: The bird flapped its wings furiously.
sentences.cn: 那只鸟使劲地拍打着翅膀。

sentences.en: The fiery right-wing leader toned down his militant statements after the meeting.
sentences.cn: 言辞激烈的右翼领袖在会后收敛了他的好战言论。

sentences.en: The left wing dipped until it was perpendicular to the ground.
sentences.cn: 左翼下垂至与地面成90度角。

sentences.en: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.cn: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

sentences.en: The unrest capped a weekend of right-wing attacks on foreigners.
sentences.cn: 周末右翼分子对外国人的攻击最终演变成了这场骚乱。

sentences.en: We were given an office in the empty west wing.
sentences.cn: 给我们在空置的大楼西翼分了一间办公室。

words.tran_cn: 有翼的；飞行的；迅速的；翼受伤的
使飞；飞过；空运；增加…速度；装以翼

phrases.tran_cn: 取得当飞机驾驶员的资格
在近旁，在眼前：在背景上相近；简短公告中会有

phrases.phrase: on a wing and a prayer

phrases.tran_cn: 飞一般地；飘飘然；轻松愉快地

phrases.phrase: spread (或 stretch 或 try) one's wings
phrases.tran_cn: 扩展某人的活动和利益；重新开始
在…庇护下；在某人照顾之下
在某人的卵翼之下，在某人的庇护之下
即兴表演，即兴演讲：在未准备、未预先考虑或没有足够的信息和经验的情况下说或做某事；即兴创作
（飞机的）翼尖；翼波状盖饰男皮鞋

trans.tran_cn: （机）翼，翅膀，侧厅，边厢，（汽车）挡泥板，（尤指政治组织的）派，边锋，飞行资格
trans.tran_en: one of the large flat parts that stick out from the side of a plane and help to keep it in the air
